name: Haunted House (itch)
description:
Haunted House is an interactive fiction game created by a class of 7th and 8th graders in the Fall 2017 Arts Exploration class.

This is their first game!

Note: 
Much of the artwork was created by the students, some was created in photoshop using photos the students found in google image search and used for educational uses. 
(They know if they make their own game outside of class that they need to either take their own pictures, find images that are free use in the creative commons, or ask for permission.)
